examples.example: 我非常愿意向大家推荐这本有趣又能增长知识的好书。

translate.english: I am very willing to recommend this interesting and knowledge-enhancing good book to everyone.

examples.example: 我真诚地向朋友们推荐这部精彩绝伦的电影。

translate.english: I sincerely recommend this wonderful and excellent film to friends.

examples.example: 我热情地向同学们推荐那个美丽又好玩的地方。

translate.english: I enthusiastically recommend that beautiful and fun place to my classmates.
